column5: post this on your facebook status and make what ever changes needed if you want to get some um, make her happy tonight...   I am blessed to have a super special Valentine, My wife. We have been married for almost xx years and we are raising xx wonderful children. I love my Valentine because she has such a caring and loving heart…My Valentine is the Rock in our family and without her I couldn’t be the Man I am today, she is the best Valentine ever! I love you xx! Happy Valentines Day.  PS, I stole this from a Scott Martin facebook update...
Wow, he's almost as good of a salesman as his Dad.
Me and mine are gonna play the Angler Game
For those of us that don't "facebook", I found that giving pink satin "clothing"   has worked wonders!
Don't you feel weird wearing it?
He's only been wearing it a short while. Ever since his wife found it in his glove compartment.
Want to get in good with the Mrs. today???    slayer
Hey hey hey! I resemble those remarks!
CRAP.... I got a slap and hung up on when I posted that. I shoulda replaced the "XX years" with the actual number... Dude you gotta be more explicit with the instructions when you post this stuff.
I didn't think I would have to spell it out for a jedimaster...
dang how am I going to do that without asking her how many years we have been married and how many of my children are with her  nothing is easy
